japanese:
きもだめしー♪　きもだめしー♪
何が出るかな、きもだめしー♪
translation:
Oh, a test of courage%p-2;――%p;! ♪ Oh, a test of courage%p-2;――%p;! ♪
What's gonna come out, on our test of...
COOUU-RAGE%p-2;――%p;! ♪

japanese:
らいは、あんまりはしゃぐな！
暗いんだからスキップは……ほら足元、危ない！
translation:
Raiha, don't fool around too much!
Skipping in the dark is dangerous.
Hey, watch your step!

japanese: はーい♪
translation: O-kaaaay! ♪

japanese:
ああああ……。
これは違う意味で肝試しだ……。
translation:
Aaaahh...
This is a different kind of
test of courage...

japanese:
らいはちゃんと一緒になれてよかったね。
心配だったんでしょ？
translation:
You're lucky you were paired with Raiha.
You were worried, weren't you?

japanese: 当然だ。
translation: Of course.

japanese:
もー、そこは嘘でもいいから
私のことも心配してみせるところじゃない？
translation:
Oh come on, that was a great opportunity to
show that you were worried about ME, too.
Could you have at least tried to lie?

japanese:
なんだ、一花も心配されたかったのか？
お前が一番しっかりしてると思って
すっかり安心してたんだが。
translation:
Oh, you'd like me to be worried about you as well,
Ichika? I was completely at ease, because
I thought that you were the most level-headed.

japanese:
……それはそうだよ。
これでも女の子なんだから、
心配されたら嬉しいに決まってるじゃん。
translation:
...Well, of course.
I'm still a girl.
I'd be happy if you were worried about me.

japanese:
そうなのか、すまなかったな。
それで、お前は大丈夫なのか？
translation:
Is that so? My bad.
Alright, are you doing okay, Ichika?

japanese: いまさら言っても遅いでーす。
translation: It's too late to ask me now.

japanese:
お兄ちゃーん、一花さーん！
早く早くー！
translation:
Big brooo, Ichika-saaan!
Hurry, hurry!

japanese:
ほら、行こ。
らいはちゃんが呼んでるよ。
translation:
Come on, let's go.
Raiha-chan is calling us.

japanese:
お兄ちゃん、御札あった！
私、取ってくるね！
translation:
Big bro, I found the amulet!
I'll grab it!

japanese:
ああ、行って来い
ただし慌てて転ぶなよ？
translation:
Okay, go get it.
But don't panic and fall, okay?

japanese: はーい♪
translation: O-kaaaay! ♪

japanese: らいはちゃん、楽しそうだね。
translation: Raiha-chan, you look like you're enjoying yourself.

japanese:
少しはしゃぎすぎだ。
昼間ならまだしも……。
translation:
Just a little bit too much, eh.
I could understand it if it were daytime...

japanese: ！！　らいはちゃん！
translation: Raiha-chan!

japanese: きゃっ！？
translation: Ahhhh?!

japanese: らいは！？
translation: Raiha?!

japanese: ２人とも大丈夫か！？
translation: Are you two okay?!

japanese:
ふう、間一髪だったね。
らいはちゃん、大丈夫だった？
translation:
Whew, that was a close call.
Raiha-chan, are you okay?

japanese:
う、うん、一花さんがかばってくれたから。
あの……ありがとうございます。
translation:
Y-yes, because Ichika-san protected me.
Um...thank you very much.

japanese:
ありがとな一花。
お前のほうはどこも怪我してないか？
translation:
Thanks a bunch, Ichika.
Are you injured anywhere?

japanese: うん、大丈夫――ッ！？
translation: Yeah, I'm okay%p-2;――%p;?!

japanese: 一花？
translation: Ichika?

japanese:
あちゃ……。
ちょっと足首、捻っちゃったかな？
translation:
Ouch...
I might have twisted my ankle.

japanese:
捻挫したのか！？
まさか折れてたり――
translation:
You sprained it?!
It isn't broken or anything%p-2;――

japanese:
いやいや、そこまではひどくはないから。
……うん大丈夫、歩くのには問題なさそう。
translation:
No no, it's not that bad.
...Yeah, I'm okay. I think I can walk.

japanese: 少し足首を冷やしていくか？
translation: Why don't we ice your ankle?

japanese:
平気だって。
それに、あんまり遅くなると
みんなが心配しちゃうからね。
translation:
I said, I'm alright.
If we get back quite late,
everyone will worry about us.

japanese:
ごめんなさい……私のせいで。
ホントにごめんなさい！
translation:
I'm sorry...it's my fault.
I'm really, really sorry!

japanese:
気にしないの。
らいはちゃんに怪我がなくて一安心だよ。
translation:
Don't worry about it.
I'm really glad you aren't injured, Raiha-chan.

japanese:
……よし。
一花、動くなよ？
translation:
...Alright.
Ichika, don't move.

japanese: えっ？　――きゃっ！？
translation: Huh? %p-2;――%p; WAAHH?!

japanese:
すまなかった。
本当なら、俺がらいはを
助けなきゃいけなかったのに……。
translation:
I'm sorry about that.
I should have been the one to help Raiha...

japanese:
たまたま私のほうが
先に気がついただけなんだからさ。
気にしなくていいよ。
translation:
It just so happens that I noticed
what had happened first, so don't worry.

japanese:
一花さん、お兄ちゃん、ごめんなさい。
私が浮かれてたから……。
translation:
Ichika-san, big bro, I'm sorry.
Because I was having too much fun...

japanese: らいはちゃんも、そんなに気にしないで。
translation:
Don't worry too much yourself,
Raiha-chan.

japanese:
起きちまったことは仕方がない。
でも反省はしっかりするんだぞ。
translation:
We can't do a thing about what's happened.
But think about your actions, okay?

japanese: うん……。
translation: Okay...

japanese:
……よし。
一花、動くなよ？
translation:
...Alright.
Ichika, don't move.

japanese: えっ？　――きゃっ！？
translation: Huh? %p-2;――%p; WAAHH?!

japanese: 別荘まで俺が運んでやる。
translation: I'll carry you back to the villa.

japanese:
ええっ？
そんなのいいって、自分で歩けるからさ！
気持ちだけで充分だよ。
translation:
HUH?
You don't need to do that, I can walk on my own!
Just the thought is enough.

japanese:
無理に歩いて悪化したらどうするんだ？
いつ救助が来るかわからないのに。
translation:
We don't even know when help will come...
What happens if you try to walk and it gets worse?

japanese: ……心配、してくれてるんだ？
translation: Are you...worried about me?

japanese: 当たり前だ。
translation: Obviously I am.

japanese: そっか……。
translation: I see...

japanese:
……よし。
一花、動くなよ？
translation:
...Alright.
Ichika, don't move.

japanese: えっ？　――きゃっ！？
translation: Huh? %p-2;――%p; WAAHH?!

japanese: フータロー君！？
translation: Futaro-kun?!

japanese: 別荘まで俺が運んでやる。
translation: I'll carry you back to the villa.

japanese:
でも……
これはちょっと強引すぎなんじゃないかな？
translation:
But...
Aren't you being a bit too pushy?

japanese:
お前が怪我をしたのは
俺がらいはに甘かったせいだからな。
その責任くらい取らせてくれ。
translation:
You got hurt because I wasn't careful enough.
Let me take responsibility for that.

japanese:
そんなに無理しなくったって大丈夫だよ。
別に、歩けないほど痛いわけじゃないから。
translation:
You don't have to do that for me.
It's not like it hurts to the point I can't walk.

japanese: ほら、下ろしていいから。
translation: Come on, put me down.

japanese: こんなときまで演技すんなよ。
translation: Don't try to act, at a time like this.
...Huh?

japanese:
お前の顔を見りゃわかる。
痛いんだろ？
translation:
I can tell just by looking at you.
It hurts, doesn't it?

japanese: なんで……？
translation: Why...?

japanese:
なんで、わかっちゃうのかなぁ……。
これでも女優なのに、自信なくしちゃうよ。
translation:
How do you know that...
I call myself an actress, but I've lost my magic touch.

japanese:
なんとなくそう思っただけだ。
しっかり掴まってろよ。
translation:
I had a feeling.
Ok, hold on tight, now.

japanese: う、うん……。
translation: O-okay...

japanese: 今、優しくされると困るんだけどなぁ……。
translation: It'll be tough if you're nice to me right now...

japanese: お兄ちゃんどうしたの？
translation: Big bro, what's wrong?

japanese: ……フータロー君？
translation: ...Futaro-kun?

japanese:
すまん、一花。
一歩も進めん、限界だ。
translation:
I'm sorry, Ichika.
I can't take another step. I'm at my limit.

japanese:
も、もう！
それは私が重いってこと？
translation:
Wh-why you!
Are you saying I'm heavy?

japanese:
勢いでいけるかと思ったんだが……
自分の運動能力を見誤っていた。
translation:
I thought I could keep up the momentum...
but I misjudged my athletic ability.

japanese: お兄ちゃん……これはカッコ悪いよ……。
translation: Big bro...that is just so lame...

japanese:
ホントだよ。
ふふ、カッコ悪いぞ？
translation:
That's true.
Teehee, that's pretty lame, indeed.

japanese: 一花、立てるか？
translation: Ichika, can you stand up?

japanese:
あ～あ。
ちょっとときめいちゃったりしたのに
オチがこれだなんて。
translation:
Aaah.
Just when my heart was beginning to flutter,
this is all that you give me.

japanese: すまん……。
translation: Sorry...

japanese:
いいよ。
君の、その気持ちが嬉しかったから。
translation:
It's alright.
I'm just really happy you felt that way about me.

japanese:
でも、君も勉強ばかりじゃなくて
少しは体力をつけないとダメだぞ？
translation:
But you've gotta get some physical strength,
rather than just study, okay?

japanese: それに関しては、弁解の余地もないな。
translation: I don't really have a good excuse for that.

japanese: 一花さん、歩ける？
translation: Ichika-san, can you walk?

japanese:
うん、ちょっと楽になったから。
心配しないで大丈夫だよ。
translation:
Yes, it's gotten a little better.
You don't need to worry about me.

japanese:
ほら、掴まってくれ。
こんな俺でも肩くらいは貸せる。
translation:
Hey, hold on to me.
I can still lend you my shoulder.

japanese: ……うん。
translation: ...Okay.

japanese:
ここまで来れば大丈夫。
フータロー君、肩を貸してくれてありがとね。
translation:
We've come this far, I'll be okay.
Thanks for letting me use your shoulder, Futaro-kun.

japanese:
無理するなよ。
別荘まであと少しなんだ、掴まってろ。
translation:
Don't overdo it.
The villa is just a little further, don't let go.

japanese:
ダメ、みんなに心配かけたくないからね。
それと……。
translation:
No, because I don't want to make everyone worry.
And also...

japanese:
私が怪我しちゃったこと、
みんなには内緒にしといてくれるかな？
translation:
Could you keep the fact I got hurt
a secret from everyone?

japanese: 一花、お前……。
translation: Ichika, you...

japanese:
せっかくの息抜きが台無しになっちゃうでしょ？
それは嫌なんだ。
translation:
Our little break will be all for nothing, right?
I don't want that to happen.

japanese:
だから、２人ともお願い。
すぐに治るだろうし、普段どおりにしててくれれば
あとは私がなんとかするから。
translation:
So, please, both of you.
I think my ankle will be okay soon, so if you just
treat me normally, I'll take care of the rest.

japanese:
……わかった。
らいはもいいな？
translation:
...I understand.
Raiha, you got it?

japanese: う、うん。
translation: O-okay.

japanese:
ただいま～！
いや～、疲れたぁ。
translation:
We're back!
Whew, I'm tired.

japanese:
一花、おかえり。
遅いから心配しちゃったよ。
translation:
Ichika, welcome back.
You were late, so we got worried.

japanese:
思ってたより暗くってさ。
フータロー君が怖がってしがみついてきて
大変だったんだよ。
translation:
It was darker than we expected.
And it was real tough, as Futaro-kun got scared,
and clung to me.

japanese:
はぁ！？　嘘をつくな嘘を！
俺はそんなことしてねーだろ！？
translation:
HUH?! That's a LIE, a LIE!
I didn't do anything of the sort!

japanese: フータロー、ホントなの？
translation: Futaro, really?

japanese:
上杉君！
あなたって人はどさくさでそんなことを！？
translation:
Uesugi-kun!
You're the kind of person
to freak out like that?!

japanese: あっさり信じるな！
translation: Don't believe her so easily!

japanese:
あはは。
冗談だから、五月ちゃんも落ち着いて。
translation:
Ahaha.
It's a joke, so calm down, Itsuki.

japanese: じゃあ、次は三玖と五月の番だね！
translation: Right, next is Miku and Itsuki's turn!

japanese: あっ……そうでした……。
translation: Aah...that's right...

japanese:
フータロー。
すぐに帰ってくるから待っててね。
translation:
Futaro.
We'll be back soon, so wait for us.

japanese: おう、頑張ってこいよ。
translation: Okay, good luck then!

japanese: 一花さん、椅子あるから座って？
translation: Ichika-san, there's a chair, why don't you sit?

japanese: うん、ありがとね。
translation: Hey, thanks.

japanese: はぁ……なるほどね。
translation: *sigh* Oh, I get it.

japanese: 二乃？
translation: Nino?

japanese:
疲れたんでしょ？
何か飲み物作ってきてあげるから、
あんたはそこで大人しく休んでなさい。
translation:
You're tired, aren't you?
I'll make you something to drink,
so just sit tight and relax.

japanese: ……ありがと、二乃。
translation: ...Thanks, Nino.

japanese:
（二乃は気づいたのか？
　なんにせよ、一花には悪いことしちまったな……）
translation:
(Has Nino noticed?
 At any rate, I caused Ichika some trouble...)
